ive got my own server but i dunno how to make npcs talk...how?? :confused:
[tt]heeeellppp!![/tt][shadow=red,left]plzzzzzzzzzzz[/shadow]

item.title: How do i make npcs talk? please help!
item.dc:creator: @sicarius99 sicarius99
item.description:
@sicarius99 wrote:

well she said shes using silab so most likely the one i posted will work[br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2007, 03:57:13 PM[/size][hr][quote=“sicarius99, post:15, topic:145546”]search code below in npchandler.java

npcs[i].textUpdate = "Players Online:  " + players;

Below that add the code below and change it to match your npc

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 637) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "The owner is Sicarius99!"; }

this may or may not work XD[/quote]

Change the owner is sicarius99! to whatever you want it to say

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make npcs talk? please help!
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

Ok ok go to npchandler.java and press crtl + f and then type moo and you should see this.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }

then after the last 2 } add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == %%%) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Message here"; }

replace the %%% with the id of the npc you want to make talk and message here to the message you want the npc to say. Then close & save then compile. tell me if you get any errors.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npcs talk? please help!

item.title: How do i make npcs talk? please help!
item.dc:creator: @Coder_X Coder X
item.description:
@Coder_X wrote:

slump40:

Just hold (Ctrl+F) and then type in the thing an npc says in the the npchandler.java textpad and change the message to what you want.

READ this again. That’s how you find it.

item.title: How do i make npcs talk? please help!
item.dc:creator: @sicarius99 sicarius99
item.description:
@sicarius99 wrote:

search code below in npchandler.java

npcs[i].textUpdate = "Players Online:  " + players;

Below that add the code below and change it to match your npc

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 637) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "The owner is Sicarius99!"; }

this may or may not work XD

Read full topic
